name: The Things We Do For Love

cards.name: Catelyn Stark
cards.text: Action: During an [intrigue] or [power] challenge in which you are the defending player, put Catleyn Stark into play from your hand knelt, participating as a defender. At the end of the phase, if Catelyn Stark is still in play, return her to your hand.

cards.name: Mad King Aerys
cards.text: Prized 1. Renown. Mad King Aerys cannot be killed unless an opponent controls a Lord or Lady character, or Ser Jaime Lannister. Dominance Action: Kneel Mad King Aerys to choose and kill a Lord or Lady character. (Limit once per round.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2012 Joust World Champion, John Bruno.

cards.name: Littlefinger
cards.text: Stealth. Littlefinger does not kneel when declared as an attacker. Interrupt: When the effects of an event would initiate, kneel Littlefinger to cancel those effects.

cards.name: Harrenhal
cards.text: Prized 2. If Harrenhal has 3 or more ghost tokens on it, sacrifice it. Interrupt: When the effects of a non-plot, non-agenda triggered ability would initiate, kill a character you own and control to cancel those effects. Place a ghost token on Harrenhal. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Heads on Pikes
cards.text: Prized 2. Dominance Action: For each character in his or her dead pile, each opponent discards the top 2 cards of his or her deck. (Max 1 per round.)

cards.name: Dark Wings, Dark Words
cards.text: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You cannot include more than 1 copy of each event in your deck. Reaction: After you play an event, draw 1 card. (Limit 3 times per round.)
cards.designer: Card design by 2011 Melee World Champion, Corey Faherty.

cards.name: The Long Voyage
cards.text: Your minimum deck size is 100 cards. Reaction: After you draw cards in the draw phase, kneel your faction card to draw 1 card.
